name: PlanetSin
description:
You are on a strange and dangerous planet. While you are in a cave protecting yourself from the radioactive light, you hear some heartbeats and follow the sound to discover an ancient giant. You have to bring him back to life to accomplish your mission. Pick up as many stones as you need to plant mushrooms outside the cave to generate the amount of energy needed. But be careful, the sun light is very radioactive and you'll need to avoid it as much as you can. Have fun!!!

How to Play

Press click on the black screen to start. On your keyboard, use the W-A-S-D to move, E to pick up the seeds and R to plant mushrooms.  

The Team

Bug Fixes:

  • Shader Uniform was named correctly
  • End scene ordering bug fixed (probably)
  • Please report other bugs
